mapper.update: update s_b_temp_setting_sub set set_temp = #{setTemp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, high_alarm_temp = #{highAlarmTemp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, low_alarm_temp = #{lowAlarmTemp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, set_humidity = #{setHumidity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_person = #{createPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_person = #{modifyPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where uid_num = #{uidNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} and day_age = #{dayAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select uid_num, day_age, set_temp, high_alarm_temp, low_alarm_temp, set_humidity, create_person, create_date, create_time, modify_person, modify_date, modify_time from s_b_temp_setting_sub
